definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The relative contents of calcium hydroxide in the colloid are inversely proportional to the colloidal particle size.
sentences.chinese: 膠體中氫氧化鈣相對含量與膠粒的大小成反比。

sentences.english: Results The calcium hydroxide method could be used to determine arsenical salt accurately.
sentences.chinese: 結果氫氧化鈣法能夠準確地測出銀杏葉片中的砷鹽。

sentences.english: It can use in the solution of calcium hydroxide for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 可長期在氫氧化鈣溶液中使用。

sentences.english: A grayish white granular mixture of sodium hydroxide and calcium hydroxide.
sentences.chinese: 灰白色顆粒狀氫氧化鈉和氫氧化鈣混合物。

sentences.english: Calcium hydroxide is an alkali almost not hard dissolved in water .
sentences.chinese: 氫氧化鈣是一種幾乎不容於誰的難溶性強鹼。

sentences.english: This article reports 30 cases of root canal filling with calcium hydroxide and iodoform paste.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道應用氫氧化鈣蒸餾水糊劑作根管充填30例。
